text: Soyayeba (ah) balalena-he desabasi, tomara ki mane kara! Ami yadi amara para'oyaradegarera paksa hate suspasta dalilera upara kayema thaki ara tini yadi nijera tarapha hate amake uttama riyika dana kare thakena, (tabe ki ami tamra hukuma aman'ya karate pari?) Ara ami ca'i na ye tomaderake ya charate ca'i pare nije'i se kaje lipta haba, ami to yathasadhya sodharate ca'i. Allahara madada dbara'i kintu kaja haye thake, ami tamra upara'i nirbhara kari ebam tamra'i prati phire ya'i.
